tool_description: Retrieves current pricing information for ingredients from specified stores or online sources, including unit prices, package sizes, and availability status.

ingredients.description: List of ingredients to price check

store_names.description: List of stores to check prices at

zip_code.description: ZIP code for local store pricing

include_organic.description: Include organic options in price search

error_messages: Invalid ZIP code: Provide a valid 5-digit US ZIP code for store location.
Store not found: One or more specified stores are not available in the given location.
Ingredient not found: Some ingredients could not be located in store inventories.
Rate limit exceeded: Too many price requests in short time period, retry after delay.
usage: Provide ingredients list, store_names to check, and zip_code for location. Optionally include organic or generic options. Returns pricing data for each ingredient at each store.

ingredient_prices.description: Formatted price data for each ingredient at each store

lowest_prices.description: Best price found for each ingredient across all stores

best_stores.description: Store with lowest price for each ingredient

availability_status.description: Whether each ingredient is available at any checked store
